actions.committee: Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a program for ecosystem restoration in Appalachia and the Northeast Region.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out in the Appalachian region, New England, and the mid-Atlantic States from New York to Virginia ecosystem restoration and protection projects that the Secretary determines will improve the quality of the environment, are in the public interest, and are cost-effective. Sets forth cost sharing requirements and cost limitations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a program for ecosystem restoration in Appalachia and the Northeast Region.
